lead_paragraph: Atlantic City, New Jersey, will have to wait until next week to learn who will emerge as the next owner of the shuttered Revel casino hotel, a sleek resort that closed after just two years in operation.

headline.main: Auction for Atlantic City's Revel Casino Adjourned Until Tuesday
headline.print_headline: Auction for Atlantic City's Revel Casino Adjourned Until Tuesday
